name: JubbLands α
description:
"It is fun for the first few minutes. It looks amazing, that's for sure, however, the gameplay is very rough for now but you know this, it is an alpha after all." -BloodyProFX | Newgrounds User "Terraria™ and Minecraft™ meet Doom™." There's tons of block-based sandbox games, some 2D others 3D, you craft, survive- I've heard this sh*t a thousand times over, let's try something new! Less craft, more boom. Mobs and monsters drop essential loot, much of which can be used on the spot.
  • Need some extra armor? Patch yourself up with an ingot or leather.
  • Need health? Run into the heat of battle and get heals from foes.
  • Sick of seeing zombies during the night? pop down a bed.
What's in the alpha? "There's still plenty of work to be done, but we've got a good baseline going on here." Items
  • Wood (Build stuff)
  • Leather (Used to patch up armor)
  • Stone axe (AKA Bad-ass multi-purpose tool)
  • DB Shotgun (She's got some kick)
  • Beef (You eat it)
  • Apple (This one's healthier)
  • Rotten Flesh (Why would you eat this?)
  • Foliage (Flowers and grass)
Craftables
  • Bed (Sleep the night away)
  • Barrel (Useless at the moment)
Mobs
  • Zombie (She wants to eat you, and not in a good way.)
  • Dryad (Has no function yet)
  • Cow (Tastes good)
  • Horse (Well uh, you can eat them too...?)
Misc.
  • You can herd animals by holding fruit.
  • Trees sometimes drop apples.
